query: INSERT INTO species (Id, Name) VALUES (1, 'Dwarf Hamster');
INSERT INTO species (Id, Name) VALUES (2, 'Tedy bear hamster');

INSERT INTO species (Id, Name) VALUES (8, 'Bearded Dragon');
INSERT INTO species (Id, Name) VALUES (10, 'Corn snake');
CREATE PROCEDURE update_species (_Id INT, _Name VARCHAR(50)) BEGIN UPDATE species SET Name = _Name WHERE Id = _Id; END;
